channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report E-2023090005
item.description:
Report E-2023090005

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: WARREN
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one case of carboguard (un1263) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the inner metal 1 gallon can had released 0.5 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023080862
item.description:
Report X-2023080862

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer leaking. Package was addressed to the admin team and was placed in a Hazmat leaker tote for further processing DescribePack: The cap on the bottle was loose and caused a leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Was placed in a Hazmat leaker tote

item.title: Report X-2023081051
item.description:
Report X-2023081051

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-05
  • City: TAYLOR
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO AUDITOR FROM TRUCK. AUDITOR NOTICED A WET SPOT ON THE BOTTOM OF PACKAGE AND REPORTED IT TO THE DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO PROPERLY HANDLE IT. RESPONDER THEN RELOCATED THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA.

item.title: Report X-2023080785
item.description:
Report X-2023080785

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-08
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WET BOX WAS FOUND DURING THE LOADING PROCESS AND PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE THEN BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: CAP / SEAL HAD FALLEN OFF CAUSING IT TO LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BOX WAS TURNED RIGHT SIDE UP ACCORDING TO THE DIRECTIONAL ARROWS PRINTED ON THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023080993
item.description:
Report X-2023080993

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-06T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED BY THE HAZMAT AUDITOR TO CONTAIN TWO AEROSOL SPRAY CANS. THE OUTER PACKAGE HAD NO HAZARDOUS WARNING LABELS OR ANY OTHER INDICATION THAT THE PACKAGE CONTAINED AEROSOL SPRAY CANS. PACKAGE IS BEING HELD IN THE HAZMAT AUDITORS CAGE.
